Package com.smartnsoft.droid4me.bo

The definition of business objects used inside the framework.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Business.Cacheable<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>  
    Business.InputStreamer<UriType,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable>
    Is able to read an input stream corresponding to a locally cached business object, from a URI, and indicate its last update time stamp.
    Business.IOStreamer<UriType,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable>  
    Business.NullableUriInputStreamer<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,NullExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>
    Is supposed to retrieve the input stream and its underlying object time stamp remotely.
    Business.OutputStreamer<UriType,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable>
    Is able to write the input stream corresponding to a local business object, attached to a URI.
    Business.Urier<UriType,ParameterType>
    Enables to define the way to reach a business object entity depending on its source.
    Business.UriInputStreamer<UriType,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>
    Is supposed to retrieve the input stream and its underlying object time stamp remotely.
    Business.UriStreamParser<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>
    An interface which proposes in addition to its parent to split each web service call into three separate actions: compute the URI, get the corresponding input stream, and then parse the result.
    Business.UriStreamParserSerializer<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>  
    Business.UriStreamSerializer<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>
    An interface which proposes to serialize a business object as an input stream.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Business
    Gathers various interfaces which handle business objects.
    Business.Atom
    Associates a time stamp to an object.
    Business.Cached<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception,StreamerExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable,InputExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>  
    Business.InputAtom
    Associates a time stamp to an input stream.
    Business.ObjectCached<BusinessObjectType extends java.io.Serializable,ParameterType,NullExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>  
    Business.ObjectUriStreamSerializer<BusinessObjectType extends java.io.Serializable,UriType,ParameterType>
    Serializes and parses the underlying business object via the native Java mechanism.
    Business.OutputAtom
    Associates a time stamp to an output stream.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Business.Source
    Indicates the origin of a business object.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Business.BusinessException  
    Business.NoUriInputStreamerException
    Indicates that no exception can be triggered by the Business.InputStreamer interface.
